data.fullContent: Maria was thrilled when she learned the city was starting work on a new bridge in midtown. She had been working in the city's Traffic and Roads Department for more than ten years and was excited to be part of the groundbreaking ceremony. The new bridge would connect two of the city's major highways and make driving very easy for people in that area. She saw the bridge being built with her own eyes, and it was a very special moment for her. She was certain the bridge would be a massive improvement to the traffic flow in downtown.

q1.translation: 当玛丽亚得知市里开始在市中心修建一座新桥时，她非常激动。她已经在城市交通和道路部门工作了十多年，很高兴能成为奠基仪式的一部分。新桥将连接城市的两条主要高速公路，使该地区的人们开车很方便。
